member.name: IBrowserService3.IEParseDisplayNameEx
member.summary: Deprecated. Parses a URL into a pointer to an item identifier list (PIDL).
member.param: The code page (for example, CP_ACP, the system default code page).
A pointer to a buffer containing the URL to parse, as a Unicode string.

param.name: dwFlags
param.para: Display a UI element during binding.

member.param: The PIDL created from the parsed URL.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IBrowserService3._PositionViewWindow
member.summary: Deprecated. Used in view size negotiations. This method is called by after determining the available dimensions.
member.param: The handle of the view window.
A pointer to a structure that contains the available dimensions.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IBrowserService3
member.summary: Deprecated. The methods exposed by this interface are analogous to virtual protected methods in normal C++ inheritance. The inheritance hierarchy of the objects spans multiple DLLs. The hierarchy is made up of a base class and several derived classes that correspond to controls, including CLSID_WebBrowser and the user's desktop. Objects not in the hierarchy should not implement this interface, nor use most of its methods.
